name: Coming Soon Mode
author: seosbg

sections.description: Simply amazing and easy to use. Coming Soon Mode WordPress plugin manage your website while it’s under maintenance mode or coming soon or site offline mode. To learn more about the Coming Soon Mode plugin please see Plugin URI. See screenshot examples at https://seosthemes.com/coming-soon-mode/
sections.installation:
Install via Plugins > Install New

  1. Search for “Coming Soon Mode”
  2. Click the “Install Now” link
  3. Click “Activate Plugin”

Via ZIP / FTP

  1. Unzip the ZIP file and drop the folder straight into your wp-content/plugins directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
Is there a tutorial?

See the Tutorial

Where can I find documentation on the plugin?

Refer the Plugin Site
